contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of April 2006, we hereby GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, VACATE the Order of the Superior Court, and REMAND the matter to that court for its consideration of the issue (s) raised on appeal. Ben v. Schwartz, 556 Pa. 475, 729 A.2d 547 (1999).
